slides.title: Risk-Based Auditing
slides.content:
# Audit Risk Model

## Formula

```
AR = IR x CR x DR

AR = Audit Risk
IR = Inherent Risk
CR = Control Risk
DR = Detection Risk
```

## Application

| Risk | Response |
|------|----------|
| High IR/CR | Lower DR |
| Low IR/CR | Higher DR acceptable |

## Detection Risk Control

- More procedures
- Larger samples
- More experienced staff

# ISA 500

## Characteristics

| Quality | Meaning |
|---------|--------|
| Sufficient | Quantity |

| Higher | Lower |

| External | Internal |
| Direct | Indirect |
| Original | Copy |
| Written | Oral |

- Reperformance

slides.title: Audit Sampling
slides.content:
# Statistical and Non-Statistical

## Approaches

| Approach | Basis |
|----------|-------|
| Statistical | Mathematical |
| Non-statistical | Judgment |

## Sampling Risk

| Type | Error |
|------|-------|
| Overreliance | Accept when shouldn't |
| Underreliance | Reject when shouldn't |
| Incorrect acceptance | Substantive |
| Incorrect rejection | Substantive |

## Sample Size Factors

- Population
- Tolerable error
- Expected error
- Confidence level

slides.title: Group Audits
slides.content:
# ISA 600

## Responsibilities

| Role | Responsibility |
|------|---------------|
| Group auditor | Overall opinion |
| Component auditor | Component work |

## Significant Components

| Test | Approach |
|------|----------|
| Financially significant | Full audit |
| Significant risks | Specific procedures |
| Other | Analytics |

## Communication

```
Group -> Component: Instructions
Component -> Group: Report on work
```

slides.title: Audit Reports
slides.content:
# ISA 700 Series

## Opinion Types

| Opinion | Basis |
|---------|-------|
| Unmodified | True and fair |
| Qualified | Except for |
| Adverse | Materially misstated |
| Disclaimer | Unable to obtain |

## Report Structure

```
1. Opinion
2. Basis for opinion
3. KAM (Key Audit Matters)
4. Responsibilities
5. Other reporting
```

slides.title: Going Concern
slides.content:
# ISA 570

## Management's Assessment

```
12 months from balance sheet date
```

## Auditor Procedures

| Procedure | Purpose |
|-----------|--------|
| Inquiry | Management plans |
| Analytics | Trends |
| Review | Forecasts |
| Events | Subsequent |

## Reporting

| Conclusion | Report |
|------------|--------|
| Appropriate, adequate | Unmodified |
| Material uncertainty | Emphasis of matter |
| Inappropriate | Qualified/Adverse |
